title: Brendan Rodgers offers support to Jamie Vardy after wife's Twitter spat with Coleen Rooney
text:
Brendan Rodgers has offered his backing to Jamie Vardy after the striker's wife Rebekah was revealed to have allegedly sold stories on Coleen Rooney, wife of Wayne.

Vardy was granted time off over the international break and spent that on holiday with his pregnant wife in Dubai following the online feud.

Rodgers is happy with Vardy's mindset ahead of the Foxes' clash at home to Burnley on Saturday.

Leeicester boss Brendan Rodgers has supported Jamie Vardy after his wife's Twitter feud

Rodgers said: 'All we ever offer is support to all the players and their families.

'I was aware of what went on last week. I had given Jamie a few extra days anyway to get away with his family and have a rest.

'I am sure it was a difficult week. But we are here to support him and his family if they need it.

'I spoke to Jamie earlier on in the week. He has trained fine and been great this week.'
description: Brendan Rodgers has offered his backing to Jamie Vardy after the striker's wife Rebekah was revealed to have allegedly sold stories on Coleen Rooney, wife of Wayne.
